p.s: Hit gelamp geo in Samni þære mægðe, þæt sumes rices mannes tun wæs, in ðam his gebur hæfde sunu, & þam wæs nama Honoratus.

Se higode symble þurh fæsten & forhæfdnesse of his cnihthade to þære lufan þæs heofonlican eþles, & sona he þeah mid swa mycelre drohtnunge þæs clænan lifes, þæt he hine sylfne þa geteah & gehæfde fram æghwilcum unnyttum worde, & swiþe his lichaman tæmede & swæncte þurh forhæfdnysse, swa ic ær beforan sæde.
Sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt his magas worhton gebeorscipe heora neahgeburum & heora freondum.
In þam gebeorscipe wæron flæsc gegearwod mannum to etanne.
Þa he þa sceolde niman & etan, þa wiðsoc he þæt flæsc for lufan þæs fæstenes.
& hine ongunnon þa his magas bysmrian & cwædon to him: et þu cniht þisne mete.
Cwyþst þu, þæt we magon niman fisc on þysum muntum & þe bringan to etanne ?
In þære stowe wæs gewuna, þæt man hwilum ymb fisc gehyrde sprecan, & þær næs næfre nan gesewen.
Ac þa se Honoratus wæs þus gebysmerod mid þysum wordum, semninga hit gelamp, þæt þær wæs wæter to lytel to manna þenunge in þam gebeorscipe.
& þa arn an wencel mid treowenum æscene, swa hit þær ðeaw wæs, to þære wyllan, & sona swa hit þæt wæter hlod, þa becom an fisc in þone wæterstoppan.
& þa sona swa þæt wencel ham gecyrred wæs, hit ageat þone fisc mid þy wætre beforan heom eallum on þam gebeorscipe, & Honoratus þa hæfde genoh on ðam fisce to anes dæges bigleofan.
& þa sona geswac eall seo bysmerung his maga, & hi ealle wundrigende ongunnon wurðian & herigan þa forhæfdnesse & þæt fæsten on Honorate, þe hi ær bysmerodon.
& hit þa swa gelamp, þæt fram ðam Godes men adrigde þa edwitu þære bysmrunge se fisc of ðam munte.
Ða se Honoratus weox & þeah mid mycclum mægnum, oþ þæt æt nyxstan he wæs gearad mid freodome fram his hlaforde þam forecwedenan.

& þa getimbrode he mynster in þære stowe, þe is Flundis gehaten, in þære he gewearð fæder & lareow twegra hund muneca, & his lif þær ascan & wearð gemærsod on healfe gehwilcre, toþon þæt hit sealde manegum mannum to bysne þæs hæalican & þæs rihtlican lifes.
Soðlice sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt of ðam ylcan munte, þe ofer his mynstre hlifade, wearð upp ascoten in þære heanysse swyðlicu mycelnes þæs ungemætan stanclifes.

Þæt aborstene clif hreas þa ofduneweard geond þam widgelnysse þæs muntes & wæs farende, oþ þæt hit com þær hit mynte feallan ofer þæt mynster, & þæt þonne wære hryre ealles þæs stoces & forwyrd ealra þæra broðra.

Ac þa þa se halga wer geseah þone stantorr ufene toweardes him farende, he þa gecigde Cristes naman mid gelomlicre stemne, & sona mid aþenedre his swiðran hand he ongæn sette & awrat Cristes rodetacen & þa ðone stantorr swa feallende gefæstnode on þære ylcan sidan þæs widgellan muntes, swa swa me sæde se æwfæsta wer Laurentius, þæt þær nære nan þing on þære stowe, þe he ongeclyfian mihte.
Ac gyt nu todæg he hangaþ swa hreosende, swylce he feallan wylle, & þæt magon geseon, þa þe þone munt sceawiað.
Petrus him to cwæð: wenað we, hwæþer þes æðele wer ær ænigne lareow hæfde, se þe æfter þan þus manigra manna lareow gewearð?
Gregorius him andswarode: ne gehyrde ic næfre, þæt he æniges mannes leorningman wære.
Ac we witon, þæt þæs halgan gastes gifu ne byð to ænigre æ gebunden.
Ac hit soðlice gewuna is þæs menniscan lifes, þæt se ne durre beon wisdomes lareow oðres mannes, se þe hine ær him sylfum nan ne geleornað.
Ne bebeode se na eac þam underðeoddum ænige hyrsumnysse, se þe ær his lareowum hyrsum beon nolde.

Ac þehhwæþre sume mæn wæron, þa þa swa wurdon innan mid haliges gastes gife gelærde, þeah þe heom gelumpe, þæt hi utan on heora lichaman mænniscra lareowa lare wana wæron, þehhwæðre heom gelamp, þæt hi mid haliges gastes gife in heora heortan ingehigdum onbryrde & gelærde wæron.

Ne sceal hwæðre se freodom þyslices lifes eallum mannum to bysne geseald beon, þy læs hwylc man forseo oððe forhogie menniscne lareow & wene & getreowige, þæt he eac mage mid halgum gaste beon gelæred & gefylled, & he þonne dwelie on his lare.

Ac soðlice þæt mod, þe mid þam godcundan gaste byð gefylled, þonne bið þis þa cuðlæcestan tacnu, þæt is þonne witodlice mægenes & eadmodnysse: gif hit swa gelimpeð, þæt heora ægþer fullfremedlice in anes mannes mod tosamne becumað, þonne byð hit openlice gecyþed, þæt hi of andweardnysse haliges gastes cyðnesse secgað.

Swa swa hit witodlice nis nahwær geræd ne on bocum gesægd be Iohanne þam fulluhtre, þæt he ænigne lichamlicne lareow hæfde, ne seo soðfæstnys, þæt is Crist sylf, se mid lichamlicre andweardnysse his apostolas lærde.

& swa þeh Iohannem ðone fulluhtre he ne getealde to his þegnum, þe he sylf lichamlice gelærde, ac he wæs mid haliges gastes gife afylled, & þa þone þe se hælend mid haliges gastes gife gefylde & gelærde, he hine þa forlet to his agnes sylfes dome buton þreatunge lichamlicre lare.
Swa hit eac in ðære ealdan æ sægð & awriten is, þæt Moyses in westen gelæded wære, & he þær fram Godes ængle þæt bebod underfeng & þurh nænigne menniscne man ne geleornode.
Ac on ðas wisan, swa swa we ær forespræcon, ma hi syndon fram mannum to arwurðianne, þonne hi syn to onherianne.
Petrus cwæð: me licað, þæt þu cwyðst.
Ac ic bidde, þæt þu me secge, hwæþer þes þus mycelre geearnunge fæder ænigne eaferan forlete, se þe þa mycclan mægnu & his dæde onhyrede.
Gregorius him andswarode: sum wæs swiðe arwurðe wer, þæs nama wæs Libertinus, se wæs on Totiles dagum þæs cingces.
Se wæs eac þæs mynstres prafost & lareow, þe is genemned Flundis.

In þæs leornungscole drohtnigende & sum man wæs gelæred, be ðam, þeah þe us ðæs bufancwedenan mannes mægnu þurh manigra manna sægene gemærsod wæron, hweðer se bufancwedena wer & se æfæsta Laurentius, se þe nu gyt lyfigende is, & he in þa ylcan tid hiwcuðlice mid him wæs, se gewunode, þæt he me be him fæla sæde, of þam ic nu þe þa feawum wordum secgan wille, þæt ic gemunan mæg.
Swa swa hit gelamp in þære ylcan mægðe Samni, þa þe we ær bufan gemyngodon, þæt se ylca wer for neodþearfe þæs mynstres on sumne siðfæt feran ongan.
& þa gelamp hit, þæt sum ealdorman wæs Daria gehaten, se wæs mid here cumende of Gotena þeode on þa ylcan stowe þæs halgan weres.
& þa wearð se ylca Godes þeow adune aworpen of his horse fram þæs ylcan ealdormannes mannum.

& he þa se Godes man wæs lustlice þone lyre þæs horses þoliende & eac þa swipan, þe he on his handa hæfde, þa he þam reafiendum mannum brohte þus cweðende: nimað nu þas swipan, þæt ge magan þis hors mid mynegian & drifan.
& þa æfter þysum wordum hraðe se Godes man hine sylfne on gebed sealde.
& þa þes bufansprecenan ealdormannes here mid færærninge becom to sumre ea, þære wæs nama Uulturnus.
Þær hi ealle ongunnon heora hors mid heora sperescæftum þerscan & mid heora spurum blodgian & heawan.

Ac hwæðre þa hors, þeah þe hie mid þam swipum geswungene wæron & mid þam spurum geblodgode wæron, þehhweðre hi of ðam stedum þa hors astyrian ne adrifan ne mihton, & swa swiðe hi þære ea wætres hryne heom ondredon, efne swa swa hit sum deaþes plyht oððe scyfe wære.

& þa þa onsittendan þara horsa mid langum geþersce heora hors geswencton, ða wæs an in ðam herge, se þe ongæt & oncneow, þæt hi for þam gylte gehindrode wæron, þe hi þone Godes man ær on wege his horses bereafedon & hine his siðes agældon.
Hi þa sona eft cyrdon æfter him & hine Libertinum astrehtne in his gebede gemetton, & hi þa to him cwædon: aris & nim þin hors.
He þa heom andsweriende þus to cwæð: gangað ge & his mid gode gebrucað, forþon ic þæs horses þearfe nabbe.
& hi þa sona lihton & hine mid nyde upp ahofon & on his agen hors asetton & eft hraðe fram him gewiton.
& þa heora hors mid swa hræde ryne þa ea oferferdon, þa þe hi ær oferferan ne mihton, efne swa swa seo ea in hire nænigne wætres stream hæfde.
& swa hit gelamp, þæt, þa þam Godes mæn his agen hors gegifen wæs, hi þa ealle heora hors æt him to bryce & to nytnesse onfengon.

Eac swilce in ða ylcan tid gelamp in Langbearda landes sumum dæle, þæt Bucellinus wæs haten sum man, se com mid Francum, forþon þe he þone hlisan geacsode of þam mynstre þæs foresprecenan Godes mannes & him gesægd wæs, þæt he mycel feoh on þam mynstre hæfde.
Þa ongunnon þa Francan gangan in to cyrican, & reðgiende hi Libertinum sohton, & hi cleopodon & acsodon, hwær he wære.
He þa soðlice Libertinus in þære ylcan cyrican eallum limum astreht læg & in his gebede gewunade.
Þa gelamp ðær sum wundorlic wise.
Þa þa reðan & þa wedendan Francan inneodon, hi spurnon mid heora fotum on þone halgan wer, þær he on his gebede læg, & þehhwæðre hi hine geseon ne mihton.
& swa hi mid blindnesse gedwealde wurdon, þæt hi eft of þam mynstre idelhænde hwurfon.
Eac swilce on oðre tid gelamp, þæt he for ðæs mynstres þingan, þe he mid þæs abbudes hæse Honoratus his lareowes underfeng & æfter him heold, sume dæge he ferde to Rauennan þære byrig.
& þa soðlice for lufan þæs arwurðan, swa hwider swa he Libertinus ferde, symble he hæfde honoratus scoh, & þone he on his bosme bær for þære lufan his lareowes.
& witodlice, þa he on his weg ferde, þa gelamp, þæt sum wif bær hire sunu deadne ongæn þam halgan were Libertino, & þæt wif þa hine geornlice beheold.

Þa færinga wearð heo onæled for lufan hire þæs deadan suna, & heo þa genam þæs halgan mannes hors be þam bridelse & to him þus cwæð & mid aðe geswor: ne færst þu nænigra þinga fram me, ær ðon þu minne sunu awecce & hine me eft cwicne agife.
& he þa se Godes wer ongan þencan, þæt þyllic wundor wære mannum ungewunelic to wyrcanne, & he aforhtode þa for ðære geornfullan benan & wolde þæt wif forbugan, ac he ne mihte nænigra þinga.

Ac nu me fealh on mode, Petrus, þæt me lysteþ sceawian & smeagean, hulic & hu mycel se camp wæs in þæs rihtwisan mannes breoste, þe þær feaht betweoh heom seo eadmodnys his sylfes lifes & seo arfæstnys & frofer þæs earman wifes, þæs unlifigendan mannes moder.

Him wæs mycel ege to þon, þæt he huru to swyðe ne nyþde, gif he þæs ungewunelican þinges to Gode wilnode, & he wæs swa mildheort, þæt him þuhte sarlic, gif he ne gehulpe þam earman & þam astyptan wife.

Ac þa to maran wuldre ðam ælmihtigan Gode seo arfæstnys oferswyðde þone strangan breost, forðon nære se breost nanra þinga oferfunden, gif hine seo arfæstnes & seo hreowsung ðæs arwyrðan weres ne oferswyðde.
Ac he gelihte of his horse & his cneow gebigde & his handa aþenede upp to heofonum & þone sceoh ateah of his bosme & asette ofer breost ðæs deadan cnihtes.
& þa him gebiddendum seo sawl þæs cnihtes gehwearf eft to þam lichaman.
He ða hine mid his handum genam & hine cwicne agæf his weopendan meder, & he ferde him forð on his wege, þe he ær ongan.
Petrus hine þa frægn: hwæt cweðaþ we, hweðer þæt mægn þus mycles wundres gedyde þe Honerates geearnung, þe Libertines gewilnung?
Gregorius him andswarode: in þære ætywnesse swa wundorlices foretacnes heora begra mægn hit gesomnode eac mid þy geleafan þæs earman wifes.
& forðon ic wene, þæt Libertinus mihte ðis gedon, forþon he geleornode, þæt he getreowde ma be his lareowes mægne, þonne be his agnum.
Þæs lareowes scoh he asette on ða breost þæs dæadan lichaman, & sona butan tweon he begæt þa sawle, þe he bæd.

Swa hit is eac sægd on oðre stowe, þæt Heliseus se witga come to Iordane þære ea & bær his lareowes sciccels, & þa sloh he ænes on þæt wæter & wolde him weg gewyrcan, swa swa he his lareow ær geseah, ac he ne mihte nanra þinga þæt wæter todælan.
& sona swa he cwæð: hwær is Helies God mines lareowes?
Þa sloh he eft on ðone stream mid his lareowes sciccelse & geworhte him weg betweoh þam wæterum.
Ongytest þu, Petrus, hu swyðe seo eadmodnys þyhð & fremað, þam þe þa godan mægnu wyrcað?
& þu þæt miht eac oncnawan, þæt eac Eliseus mihte sona þæt mægn his lareowes gegearwian, þa þa he gelædde to gemynde him sylfum þone naman his lareowes.
& forðon þe he gehwearf under ðam lareowe to eadmodnysse, he worhte sona sylfa þa mægn, þe se lareow ær worhte.
Petrus him to cwæð: me lysteþ wel þæs þu sagast.
Ac la, ic þe frigne, hwæðer nu gyt aht oþres sy, þe þu mæge secgean be ðam godan men to ure lare getrymnysse.
Gregorius him andswarode: witodlice ic mæg ma secgan, ac ic nat, hwær se sy, se þe hine onhyrgean wille.
Ic gelyfe, þæt þæt mægn þære geþylde sy mare, þonne þa wundru & þa foretacnu.

Hit gelamp sume dæge, þæt se abbud, se æfter þæs arwurðan Honorates forðfore heold & hæfde þone ræcenddom & hlaforddom þæs mynstres, þæt he wearð gebolgen mid mycelre hatheortnysse wið þone æfæstan wer Libertinum swa swiðe, þæt he hine mid his handum forbeah.

& þa forþon þe he næfde gyrde hine mid to sleanne, þa gefeng he þone fotsceamol æt his reste foran & beot Libertinum on þæt heafod & on þa onsyne, oþ þæt he gedyde, þæt eall his andwlita awannode & asweoll.
& he þa swa swiþe geswungen gewat swigende to his agenre ræste.

Þa oðre dæge hæfde Libertinus ane gemotstowe gecweden ymb sume neodþearfe þæs mynstres, & þa þa he gefylled hæfde his uhtsang & his gebedu, þa eode he to ðam abbude, þær he on his ræste wæs, & he him eadmodlice his bletsunge bæd.
Þa gemunde se abbud, hu swyðe se halga man wæs fram eallum mannum gelufod & gearod.
Þa wende he, þæt he for ðan teonan, þe he him þy ærran dæge gedyde, mid ealle of þam mynstre gewitan wolde.
Þa acsode se abbud hine þus cweþende: hwider wilt þu gangan?
Him þa Libertinus andswarode: min fæder, ic hæfde gyrstandæge gecweden & gehaten, þæt ic nu todæge cuman wolde ymb sume þearfe þises mynstres, forþon ic hit nu nænigra þinga ayldan ne mæg.
& he þa se abbud in his heortan ingehigdum sceawode his sylfes reðnysse & his agene heardnysse.

Gelice he eac gemunde þa mycclan eadmodnysse & manþwærnysse Libertines, & þa hraþe astylde of his ræste & Libertinum be his fotum genam, & he hine cyðde, þæt he wið hine scyldig wære, forðon þe he geþrystlæhte, þæt he wið swa mycelre geearnunge man swylce wælhreownysse fraceþa gefremede.
Ongæn þan eac Libertinus hine sylfne to þæs abbudes fotum astrehte, & he sæde, þæt hit his sylfes gylt wære swiðor, þonne hit ðæs abbudes uncysta wæron, þæt broc, þæt he þær aræfnode.
& swa hit wæs gedon, þæt se fæder wearð to swa mycelre monþwærnysse gelæded, & þa gewearð seo eadmodnys þæs geongran to lareowe þam abbude.
& þa þa he for þæs mynstres þearfe, swa swa he ær gecweden hæfde, wæs utfarende, hine þa manige his cuðra manna geornlice acsodon, ge æþelcunde ge oðre, þa þe hine symble swiðe arodon.
Hi þa eac swiðe wundrodon, hwæt þæt þing wære, þæt he swa toswollen heafod & swa wanne andwlitan hæfde.
He þa cwæð to heom: gyrstanæfen me gelamp, þæt ic ungewealdes ætsporn æt anum fotscamele, & ic þa þus geslægen wearð.
& swa se halga wer wæs healdende in his breostum þa are þære soðfæstnysse, & he his fæder & his lareowes uncysta ne ne geypte, ne he eac in nænigre leasunge synne ne georn.

Petrus cwæð: wenað we þe ne wenaþ, hwæðer þes arwyrða werr Libertinus, be þam þu þus fela tacna & wundra sægdest, ænigne man in þære ruman & mycclan gesomnunge læfde, se þe his þeowa & his þæs clænan lifes onhergend beon wolde?
Gregorius him andswarode: Felix wæs haten sum broður, se wæs ær genemned Curuus, þone þu þe sylf ful geare cuþest, se nu niwan wearð prafost þæs ylcan mynstres.
Se me fela wunderlicra þinga sægde be þam gebroðrum þæs ylcan mynstres.
Of ðam wundrum hwelchugu word, þa ðe me to gemynde coman, ic wille gereccean, forþon ic efste to oðrum spellum.
& swa þeh ne wene ic no, þæt me sy an ðæra spella to forlætanne, þe me fram þam ylcan breþer gesægd is.
Sum munuc wæs in ðam ylcan mynstre, se wæs swiðe godes lifes man & mycelre geearnunge, & he wæs þæs mynstres wyrtweard.
Þa gewunode an ðeof, þæt he ofer þone geard stah & deogollice stæll þa wyrta.
Swa se wyrtweart his wyrta geornor sette & plantode, swa he hira læs funde, þonne he eft to com, & he geseah, þæt þa wyrta sume wæron mid mannes fotum fortredene & sume wæron mid ealle genumene.
& he þa ymbeode utan ealne þone wyrtun.
Þa æt nexstan funde he, hwær se þeof gewunode, þæt he ofer þone geard steah, & he þa eft geondeode þurh þone wyrtun.
Þa funde he ane næddran, þære he wæs bebeodende & þus to hire cwæð: folga þu me.
& hi þa becomon to ðære stigole, þær se þeof oferstah in ðone wyrttun.
Þa bebead se wyrtweard þære næddran þus cweðende: ic þe bebeode on drihtnes naman hælendes Cristes, þæt þu ða stigole behealde, & þu ne læte þone þeof herin gangan.
Seo næddre heo sylfe hraðe oncyrde & be þære stigole hi astrehte.
& þa þa ealle men ymb midne dæg gestildon & gereston, þa com se þeof, swa him ær gewunelic þeaw wæs, & stah upp on þone geard.
& þa þa he his fota oðerne ofdune asette, he þa færinga geseah, þæt seo astrehte nædre his weg beleac.
Þa wearð he swiþe afyrhted in him sylfum & afeoll ofduneweard, & his oðer fot wearð fæst on anum sagle þæs geardes.
& swa he hangode adune onwændum heafde, oþ þæt se wyrtweard eft þider com.
Ða com se wyrtweard on gewunelicre tide, & he þone þeof þær hangiende funde.
Þa cwæð he to þære næddran: Gode ic þanc secge þæs þu gefyldest, þæt ic bebead.
Far nu þider þe þu wille.
Heo þa seo nædre hraðe þanon gewat.
Þa cwæð he to þam þeofe: broðer, hwæt is þis?
Forþon þe þu þis dydest, God þe me on geweald sealde.
Forhwon gedyrstigodest þu, þæt þu þus oft in þisra muneca wyrtune stalodest?
& he þa æfter þisum wordum þæs þeofes fot onlysde of þam gærde, þe he ær fæste on clyfode, & hine ungederedne ofdune asette & cwæð to him: gang mid me.

Þa gelædde he hine to þæs wyrtgeardes gate, & gehwylce wyrte, þe he ær mid stale gewilnode, he him þæt mid mycelre wynsumnysse sealde þus cweþende: gang nu & æfter þissere tide ne stala þu her na ma, ac þonne þe þearf sy, ga þe her to me, & þæt þu ær mid unrihte on urum geswince begeate, ic þe þæt mid estfulnesse sylle.
Petrus cwæð: nu oð þis, swa me þinceð, holenga ic wende, þæt nænige fædras næron in Suðlongbardum, þa þe þyllicu mægnu & tacnu wyrcan mihton.

Gregorius him &swarode: mid sægene þæs arwyrðan weres Furtunates, se wæs abbud þæs mynstres, þe nemned is Cicerones bæþ, & eac swylce þurh oðra arwurðra wera segena ic geleornode, þæt ic nu secgan wille.

Sum wæs se halgesta man in Ualeria mægðþe, þam wæs nama Equitius se fore geearnunge his sylfes lifes wæs gehæfd & ongyten mid eallum, þam þe hine cuþon, for his sylfes gewyrhtum mycelre geearnunge man.
Se ylca Furtunatus us wæs hiwcuðlic.
Butan tweon se Equitius for his haligdomes mycelnesse wearð manigra mynstra fæder & hlaford.
Þa gelamp him in þa tid his geogoðe, þæt he wearð mid grimmum gewinne his lichaman lustes geswænced.
Ac þa nearonessa his agenre costunge hine gedydon þy geornfulran to þære teolunge godcundra beboda.
& he þa on þas wisan him to þam ælmihtigan Gode mid singalum gebedum læcedom sohte.
He þa sumre nihte geseah him ætstandan Godes ængcel, se his gesihðe ætywde & him ealle þa cennendan leomu of acearf.
& of þære tide he wearð swa fremde þære costunge, efne swa he næfre þone had on his lichaman næfde.
Mid þy mægne he wæs gebælded of ðæs ælmihtigan Godes fultume to þon swyðe, þæt he, se þe ær wæs wera ealdorman, æfter þon he eac ongan wifhades manna lareowdom & hlafordscipe underfon.

Ne blan he hwæðre, þæt he his geongran ne manode, þæt hi næfre gelyfdon heom sylfum to swiðe in þissere wisan, þæt him wære eaðelic se wifhired to healdanne & to rihtanne & þonne þurh þæt swyþur cunnedon þære Godes gife, þe hi na ne onfengon, þonne hit wærlic wære.
On þa ylcan tide hit gelamp, þa þa scincræftigan wurdon arasode in þyssere Romaniscan byrig, þæt Basilius fleonde gesohte in munuchade Ualeriam þa mægðe, se wæs yldost & fyrmest of þam drycræftum.

& he þa Basilius se scincræftiga ferde to þam arwurðan were Castorio, se wæs biscop on Amiternine þære ceastre & gehihte to him & gewilnode, þæt he hine befæste, þæt he moste beon læce þæs nunmynstres.
& þa ferde se biscop, oþ þæt he becom to ðam mynstre & mid him lædde Basilium þone leasan munuc & bæd þa Equitium þone Godes þeow, þæt he underfenge þone munuc in his gesomnunge.
Þa sona swa he se halga wer locode on hine, he cwæð to þam biscope: min fæder, ne þincð me na, þæt þes sy munuc, þe þu me her beodest, ac ic geseo, þæt he is deofol sylf.
Him þa andswarode se biscop & cwæð: þu secest nu beladunge, hu þu mage þæt findan, þæt þu ne þurfe me tyðian þæs þe þu gebeden eart.
Se Godes wer þa cwæð to him: þæt ic secge þæt ic him on geseo.
Ac ne wen þu na, þæt ic nylle þe hyran.
Ic do þæt þu me hatest.
& he þa hine underfeng on þæt mynster be þæs biscopes hæse.
Þa æfter naht manegum dagum ferde se Godes man hwene fyr fram þam mynstre to trymmanne eac oþre geleaffulle men to Godes þam upplican wyllan.

Ða gelamp hit sona swa he on færelde wæs, þæt in þam fæmnena mynstre, in þam wacode eac þæs ylcan fæder & lareowes ymbhoga, þa an þara nunnena, þe wæs swyþe fægru æfter þæs lichaman gesceape, wæs þa færlice mid fefre geswenced & mid mycclum brogan nallæs na rihtstefnum, ac mid gristbitingum ongan clypigan & cweðan: nu ic sceall sweltan, buton Basilius se munuc cume to me, & he þonne me gehæle þurh þone wisdom his læcecræftas.

Ac þa ne dorste nan þæra muneca on heora hlafordes æfweardnysse gan in þa gesamnunge þara fæmnena, & mycle læs þam wæs alyfed, þam þe niwan com, & his lif wæs þa gyt uncuð eallre þære gesomnunge þara broðra.
& þa sona sændon hi ærendracan to þam Godes þeowe Equitie & him þæt bodedon, þæt seo nunne wære inhæted mid unmætum feferadlum, & þæt heo geornlice bæde Basilies neosunge þæs muneces.
Sona swa se halga man þas ærendu gehyrde, þa hloh he eallswylce he þæt spell oferhogode & þus cwæð: hwæt.
Ne sæde ic hit ær, þæt he wære deofol nalles munuc?

Gað nu to him & hine adrifað of þam mynstre; & be þam Godes mænnene þære nunnan, þe þær nearolice geþread wæs mid feferadle, ne þurfe ge na sorgian, forþon on þissere ylcan tide, þe ic þas word cweþe, na ma heo ne byþ winnende on feferadlum, ne heo ne biddeþ Basilies tocymes.
& þa cyrde him ham se munuc, þe hit ærendode, & sona ongæt, þæt seo Godes fæmne wæs gehæled in þa ylcan tide, þe se Godes þeow cyrde.
Þeah he feor wære, Æquitius þa he hire hæle gecwæþ & gehet.

Witodlice þes halga man in þam mægne þisses wundres wæs habbende þa bysene ures lareowes, þæt is þæs hælendan Cristes, se wæs gelaþod to anes rices mannes suna & wæs gebeden fram his fæder, þæt he him hæle gæfe.

& he þa sona mid his anum worde hine gehælde, & sona swa þæs cnihtes fæder him fram cyrde, on þa ylcan tid he oncneow, þæt him wæs eft lif seald, þe he ær gehyrde of þæs hælendes sylfes muðe, þæt him lif gehaten wæs.
Witodlice ealle þa munecas heora fæder hæse & bebod gefyldon & þone ylcan Basilium of ðæs mynstres eardunge ut adrifon.
& þa þa he utadrifen wæs, he cwæð: gelomlice ic wæs mid minum drycræftum Equities cytan & mynster ahonde, & ic hwæþre nænigne man of his mynstre beswican ne mihte.
Se æfter medmycclum fyrste eft in þyssere ylcan Romebyrig fram cristenum folce forbærned wearð for his mandædum.
Soðlice sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt an nunne of þam ylcan mynstre þara fæmnena eode in þone wyrttun.
Þa geseah heo ænne leahtric.
Þa lyste hi þæs & hine genam & forgeat, þæt heo hine mid Cristes rodetacne gebletsode, ac heo hine freclice bat.
Þa wearð heo sona fram deofle gegripen & niðer on þa eorðan gefeoll & wæs swiþe geswenced.
& hi þa hrædlice to heora fæder Equito ærendracan sændon & him þis sædon & hine bædon, þæt he hraðe come & mid his gebedum heora swuster gehælde.
& þa he halga man gebiddende arn.
& sona swa se halga fæder in þone wyrtun ineode, þa ongan se deofol, þe þa nunnan swencte, of hire muþe clypian swylce he dædbote don wolde & þus cwæð: hwæt dyde ic hire?
Hwæt dyde ic hire?
Ic me sæt on anum leahtrice, þa com heo & bat me.
He þa se Godes wer mid mycelre æbylignysse bebead, þæt he of hire gewite, & þæt he þa stowe on þæs ælmihtigan Godes fæmnan læng ne hæfde ne on hire ne wunede.
& he þa sona onweg gewat, & he na onufan þæt hire gehrinan ne moste ne ne dorste.

Sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt Felix, se wæs æþele fæder Nursine þære mægðe & hlaford þisses ylcan Castories, se nu gyt mid us wunað in þissere ylcan Romebyrig & us þis spell be Equitie sæde þam halgan were.

Þa þa he geacsode, þæt se arwurða wer næfde þone halgan had, þe Godes folces lareowas habban scoldon, & swa þeah ferde geond manige stowe & geornlice Godes bebod cyþde & lærde, þa sume dæge gesohte Felix hine Equitium mid hiwcuþlicre byldo & þus cwæð to him: hu dearst þu æfre þus bealdlice læran?
Ne þu þone halgan had næfst, ne þu nane leafe ne onfengce æt þam Romaniscan biscope, þe þu under drohtast & eardast.

Ða wæs se halga wer Equitius mid þære acsunge geþread & genyded, & he þa him secgan ongan, hu he þa leafe onfeng þære bodunge þus cweþende: þa wisan, þe þu nu to me sprecst, þa ic me sylf ær swiþe georne gemunde.
Ac sumere niht hit gelamp, þæt me sum geong man ætgestod, se wæs swiðe fæggerre ansyne, & he asette his læceiren on mine tungan & þus cweþende wæs: geseoh nu, þæt ic sette min word in þinum muðe.
Ac gang þu & boda.
Ða æfter þam dæge, þeh þe ic wolde þara godcundra lara geswigian, þonne ne mihte ic.
Petrus cwæð: ic wolde þæs halgan fæder weorca nu gyt ma witan & ongytan, forþon þe hit gesæd is, þæt he þyllice gife onfenge.

Gregorius him andswarode: wite þu, Petrus, þæt þæt weorc byþ of þære gife geseald, nalles seo gifu of þam weorce, elcor ne byþ seo gifu Godes gifu, forþon se mann ne mæg naht gewyrcan, buton hit sy ær fram Gode gyfen.
Ac symble þa gyfa gaþ nu beforan ælcum weorce, þeah þe þa gyfa eac of þam æfterfiligendan weorce geweaxen & gemærsien.
Ne scealt þu hwæþre þæs andgites bedæled beon þisses eadigan mannes lifes Equities.
Wel þæt ongæt se eadiga wer Albinus, se wæs biscop in þære circan on þære cæstre Reatina, & nu gyt syndon manige men lifigende, þa þe þis gemunan magon.
Ac hwæt secest þu ma þæs weorces, þa þa seo clænnys his lifes geþwærede mid þære geornfulnesse his bodunga?

& mid swiþe mycclum ege he wearð onæled, þæt he wæs manna sawla þam ælmihtigan Gode gestreonende, & swa he þa mynstru heold, þæt he arn þurh cristenra folca gesomnunge geond ceastre & geond tunas on healfa gehwilce & þurh geleaffulra manna hus, to þon þæt he þara gehyrendra heortan to þære lufan þæs heofonlican eþles awehte.
He wæs swiðe yfellic on his gegerelan & swa forsewenlic, þeh þe hit gelumpe, þæt him hwilc man þe hine ne cuþe ongen come & se þonne wære gegreted, þæt he forhogode togenes gretan.
& swa oft swa he to oðrum stowum faran wolde, þonne wæs his þeaw, þæt he wolde sittan on þam horse, þe he mihte findan forcuþlocost on þam mynstre.
& eac he breac on þam hælftre for bridelse & weþera fella for sadole & lædde him sylf his halgan bec mid him in fellenum sæccum, þa wæron alegd his on þa swiðran healfe & on þa wynstran.
& þonne swa hwider swa he com, he symble ontynde þone æspryng godcundra gewrita & þænde þa mædwe geleaffulra moda.
Þa æt nexstan becom þisses ylcan weres hlisa to cyþnysse Romana biscope, & þa wæs hit sona, swa hit foroft byð, þæt seo tunge þara leasolecendra cweleþ & swenceþ þæs sawle, þe hi gehieran lysteþ.

Swa on þa ylcan tid, þe þa preostas gehyrdon þises apostolican setles biscopes þone hlisan þæs halgan weres, hi þa sona olæcende wæron ymb þæt seofiende & þus cwædon: hwæt is þes ceorlisca wer, þe þus hafað him sylfum genumen þa ealdorlicnysse þære halgan lare & neþeþ þus ungelæred, þæt he agnað him sylfum þa þenunga ures apostolican hlafordes?
Ac la, hlaford, gif hit þin willa sy, sænde man ærendwrecan to him, & se hine hider gefecce, þæt we magan ongytan, hwilc his seo circlice strengþ sy.
Þa sona swa hit þeaw is, þæt þam mode, þe biþ abysgod in manigum þingum, swiþe undercreopeð seo lease olehtung, gif heo ne byþ þy hraþor onweg adrifen fram þære heortan æmtignesse.
Swa þa lærendum þam preostum se papa geþafode, þæt Equitius moste beon gelæded to Romebyrig, & þæt man ongæte, hwæt se his wisdom wære.

& he þa sænde Iulianum his witan, se æfter þon wearð biscop on Sabinense þære cyrcan, & þæt bebead, þæt he hine gelædde mid mycelre are, þy læs se Godes þeow æniges teonan oht ongeate for þissere gemetingce.
He þa sona wolde gehyran be þære wisan þara preosta willan & ferde ofstlice to þæs halgan mannes mynstre.
& þa he þær com æfweardum þam abbode, he gemette þa writeras ærest writende & þa acsode he hi, hwær se abbud wære.
Hi him cwædon to: he maweþ heig on þissere dene, þe ligeþ beneoþan þisum mynstre.
Se ylca Iulianus hæfde ænne swiþe oferhigdigne cniht & mycelne wiðerbrecan, þam he sylf mihte uneaðe gewyldan.
Þa sænde he þisne to þam halgan men, þæt he hine hrædlice to him gelædde.
Þa arn se cniht & mid þweorum gehigde eode hwætlice on þa mædwe, & þa geseah he, þæt hi ealle meowan þæt heig, þa þe þær wæron.
Ða acsode he, hwilc wære Equitius.
Þa sona swa he geacsode, hwilc he wæs, & he hine feorran onlocode, þa wearð he mid unmætum ege geþread.

He ongan him ondrædan & wergian & to þon swiðe cwacian, þæt he uneaðe hine sylfne aberan mihte, & þa swa bifigende com to þam Godes mæn & sona mid his earmum befeng his cneowu & wæs cyssende & him sæde, þæt his hlaford þider to him cumen wære.
& he þa se Godes þeowa gehalette þone cniht & him þus bebead & cwæð: aris & ber þis grene hig þam horsum to mete, þe ge hider on comon.
& nu is lytel to lafe þysses mæþes & swa þis gedon byþ, ic ga æfter þe.
Þa wundrode Iulianus swiþe, þe þider onsænded wæs, hwæt þæt wære, þæt se cniht yldode, þæt he hraðor ne come.
Þa he þa geseah þone cniht to him cyrrende & hig berende on his sweoran of þam mædwum, þa ongan he swiðe yrre clypigan ongæn him & þus cwæð: hwæt is þis, þæt þu dyst?
Ic wende, þæt þu scoldest me mann to lædan, nu byrst þu heig.
Se cniht him andswarode & cwæð: he cymð æfter me, se þu secest.
Þa com se Godes wer gescod mid gehammenum scon & bær on his eaxle his hegsiþe.
Þam habbude þa gyt feorr gangende se cniht sæde þa his hlaforde, þæt þæt wære, se þe he sohte.
Þa semninga se ylca Iulianus, swa he geseah þone Godes þeowan, he forseah hine sona for his gegerelan & þohte mid þwerum mode on his oferhigdum, hu he sceolde him to sprecan.

Ac þa sona swa se Godes þeowa him wæs neah, on þæs ylcan Iulianus mod gefor unaræfnedlicu fyrhtu, swa þæt he forhtode, þæt uneaðe him mihte his tunge genihtsumian, to þon þæt he sæde his ærende, þe he þider fore com.
He þa sona mid geeadmodadum gaste georne to his cneowum gewilnode, þæt he for hine gebæde & sæde, þæt his fæder se apostolica biscop hine geseon wolde.
Þa ongan se arwyrða Equitius don unmæte þancas þam ælmihtigum Gode & þæt sæde, þæt hine geneosode seo uplice gifu þurh þone hean biscop þæs apostolican setles.
& þa hraðe gecigde his broþer & him bebead, þæt on þa ylcan tid sceoldon beon heora hors gegearwode & ongan his geferan swiðe þreagan, þæt hi scoldon on þa tid utfaran.
Þa cwæð Iulianus to him: ne mæg þæt nænigra þinga beon, forþon ic eom swiþe werig for þy langan wege, þæt ic ne mæg todæg heonan faran.
Þa andswarode se halga him & þus cwæð: þu geunrotsast me þonne, min sunu, forþon ic wat, gif we on þysum ylcan dæge ne feraþ, þæt we tomorgen nænig færeld ne þurhteoð.
& þa swa se Godes þeowa wæs genyded fram werignysse his geferana, þæt he wunode þa niht on his mynstre.
Þa þe æfterfylgendan dæge sona on dægred com ærendraca to Iuliane mid epistolan & mid swiðe geswenctan horse for ærninge.
In þam epistolan wæs beboden, þæt he ne gedyrstlæhte to þon, þæt he aht grette þone Godes þeowan, oþþe hine of ðam mynstre styrede.

& þa sona swa he acsode, forhwon se cwide onwænded wære, he ongæt, þæt þy ylcan nihte, þe him se ærendraca æfter wæs sænded, þæt se apostolica biscop wæs swiðe abreged on swefne þurh nihtlice gesihþe, forhwon he geþrysstlæhte, þæt he hete þone Godes man swa swæncan & to him spanan.
& þa hraðe aras Iulianus se ærendraca & hine sylfne þære gebedrædenne þæs arwurðan weres befæste & þa cwæð to him: eower fæder eow biddað, þæt ge ne scylen eow swencan on þone siþ.
Þa se Godes þeowa þis gehyrde, þa wæs he sona geunrotsod & þus cwæð: hu, ne sægde ic gyrstandæge, þæt gif we þa sona ne ferdon, þæt us nu nære alyfed to farene?
& þa fore gegearwunge þære soþan lufe he hæfde þone ærendracan Iulianum hwylcnehugu fyrst in þam mynstre, to þon þæt he him swa gelettum & swa genyddum forgeafe & gedyde hwæthugu getæse his gewinnes.

Ongyt nu, Petrus, on hu mycelre Godes hyrnysse beoð, þa þe cunnon hi sylfe forseon on þysum life, & mid hwylcum ceasterwarum beoð in are getealde innan, þa þe ne scamiað, þæt hi syn mannum forsewene utan.
Swa eac wið þan beforan Godes eagum licgað forsewene, þa þe aþindað & aswellað þurh þa wilnunge þæs idlan gylpes mid heom sylfum & beforan eagum heora nehstena.

Be þan seo soðfæstnys, þæt is Crist, cwæð to sumum mannum: ge wæron þa þe eow sylfe godiaþ beforan mannum, ac God cann eowre heortan, forþon eall þæt mannum þinceð healic, þæt byþ onscuniendlic beforan Gode.
Petrus cwæð: ic wundrige swyþe, þæt æfre mihte be swilcum were & swa mycclum biscope beon undercropen seo deofollice scinnys þurh þa olehtinga þara preosta.
Gregorius him andswarode: to hwan wundrast þu, Petrus, forþon þe we men syndon & beoþ ful oft belogene fram oþrum mannum?

Hwæþer þe of mode abeah, þæt þu ne gemundest, þæt Dauid, þe gewunade, þæt he hæfde witedomes gast in him, he demde dom ongen þone unscyldigan Ionathanes sunu, þa þa he gehyrde þæs leogendan cnihtes word?
Þæt þonne hwæþre gedon wæs þurh Dauid, we gelyfað, þæt hit riht wære in þam diglan Godes dome, ac hwæþre we ne magon na geseon ne geþæncan, hu hit riht wære in þam mænniscan rihte.
Hwylc wundor is þæt forþon, Petrus, þeh þe we hwilum syn gelædde in oþra leogendra muþe, we þe nænige witigan næron?

Ac we witan, þæt þæt swiþe mycel is, þæt anra gehwilces biscopes mod byþ forhergod & todrifeþ full oft seo þicnes þara woruldlicra ymbhogena, & þonne hit þæt mod byð todæled to manegum wisum, hit byð þy medmare to hwylcum synderlicum þingum.
& swa myccle ma hit byþ undercropen mid scinnysse & beswicen in hwylcumhugu anum þinge, swa myccle hit rumor & widdor byþ abysgod on manegum wisum.
Petrus him cwæþ to: swiðe soðe wæron þa word þe þu sagast.
Gregorius him andswarode: ne sceall ic na forswigian, þæt ic nu ongæt þy þe me hit sægde se arwyrþa wer Ualentinus be þam ylcan abbude.
He cwæð, þæt his lichama wære bebyrged in þam gebedhuse þæs eadigan Laurenties þæs martyres.
Þa eode sum ceorl & asette his earcan mid hwæte gefylde ofer þæs halgan mannes byrgene & ne gymde, þæt he geþohte oþþe him ondrede, hu mycel & hu arwurðe wer þær reste.

Þa semninga wæs geworden þoden of heofonum, þæt he ahof upp þa earcan, þe aseted wæs ofer þa byrgene & hi forð awearp feorr of þon þe heo on stod, & elles ealle þa þing þe þær wæron gewunedon on heora agnum stede, efne þæt swa openlice ealle þa þe þær wæron ongæton, hu mycelre geearnunge wæs, se þe his lichama þær reste.
Eac þa word, Petrus, þe ic her gyt secgcan wille, ic oncneow of sægene þæs forecwedenan & þæs arwurþan weres Fortunates, þæs yldu & weorc & bylwitnes me licaþ swiþe wel.
Se ylca me sæde, þæt Langbearde foron hergiende in Ualeriam þa mægðe.
Þa þa munecas of þæs arwurþan weres mynstre Equities geflugon in þæt gebedhus, hi ongunnon teon ut þa munecas & hi todrifon þurh manegu tintregu & eac sume mid heora swurdum acwealdon.
Þa an þara muneca wæs onstyred mid grimman sare, he ageomrode & cleopode þus: loca nu, þu halga Equitius.
Licað þe, þæt we synt þus atogene, & þu us nylt no scyldan?

Sona to þæs stefne se unclæna gast gefor on þa reþgiendan Langbeardan, & hi þa urnon geond þæt land wedende, & swa lange hi wæron fram deofle geswencte, oþ þæt þa Langbeardas ongæton, þa þe þær ute wæron, þæt hi ofer þæt ne dorston nohte gretan þa halgan stowe.
& hit gelamp þa, þæt se halga wer mundbyrde his agene þegnas, & he forgæf eac manegum oþrum læcedom & mundbyrd, þe þyder æfter þon geflugon to his byrgenne.

& eac ic geleornode, þæt ic nu segcan wylle, of þære gesægene mines efenhadan þæs biscopes, þe leofode manega gær in munuchade in Anthonitana þære byrig, & þær his þæt æwfæste lif leofde swyþe ungneþelice; þæt us cyðdon be þam ure freond manige, þe on þam lande wæron.
Se ylca me sæde, þæt neah þære cæstre, þe he on wæs, wære aseted þæs eadigan Stephanes cyrice þæs martyres.
In þære wæs sum swiðe arwurðes lifes man, þam wæs nama Constantinus, & se breac þær & þeowode cyricweardes þenunge.

Þæs halignysse hlysa hine sylfne gemærsode feor & wide & hine gelædde to manigra manna cyþnesse, forþon þe se ylca wer forseah eallinga þa eorðlican þing & mid ealles modes geornnysse lufode þa heofonlican ane.
Sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt in þære ylcan cyrcan wæs eles wana, & þes forecwedena Godes þeowa næfde, þæt he mihte þa leohtfatu onælan.
Þa gefylde he mid wætre þære cyrcan cyllan & sette tapor onmiddan, swa hit þeaw is, & þa mid fyre ontænde.
& swa þæt wæter barn þa in þam leohtfatum, swylce hit ele wære.
Ac ongyt nu, Petrus, hwylcre geearnunge þes wær wære, þe wæs swa mid nyode genyded for elelæste, þæt he gewænde þæs wæteres gecynd on eles þicnesse.
Petrus him cwæð to: hit is swiþe wundorlic, þæt ic nu gehyrde æt þe.
Ac ic wolde witan, hwylcre eadmodnesse þes man mihte beon innan, þe swa mycelre halignysse wæs utan for þam mægenum þe he wrohte.

Gregorius him andswarode: genoh gerisenlice þu hit secest, þæt þu wilt witan, hwilc his mod wære betwih þam wundrum þe he dyde, forþon þe þæt swyþe mycel is, þæt symble deofol sliteð þæs mannes mod innan mid his costunge & hine wile geteon in oferhigd, gif se man oht wundorlices oþþe clænlices wyrceþ utan þurh Godes gife.
Ac gif þu gehyrest þysses arwurðan Constanties ane dæde þe he gedyde, þu ongytest swiðe hraðe, hwilcre eadmodnesse man he wæs.
Petrus cwæð: æfter þan þu me sædest hwilc wundor his dæda, ofer þæt me lysteþ get, þæt þu me hwæthugu lære be his modes eadmodnesse.
Gregorius him andswarode: forþon þe þisses mannes halignysse hlisa swiðe weox, manige men hine geornlice lystan geseon of manigum boldgetalum.
Þa sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt sum ceorl for feorran, to þan þæt he hine geseon wolde.
Þa com he on þa ylcan tid, þe se halga wer fylde þa leohtfatu in þære cyrcan & stod uppe on treowene hlædran.
He wæs lytel on his wæstmum & swiðe yfellices hiwes & forsewenlices.
Þa se ceorl, þe þider com hine to geseonne, acsode & geornlice bæd, þæt him scolde beon getæht, hwilc he wære.
& þa tæhton him þa þe hine cuðon, hwilc he wæs.
Ac swa se man nat, þa dysigan mod leogað, þonne hi wenaþ, þæt þæs mannes geearnung sy swylce his lichaman ansyn byþ.

Ða sona, swa se ceorl geseah þone Godes þeowan swa lytelne & swa forseowonlicne, þa nolde he eallunga gelyfan on his mode, þæt he se ylca wære, ac wende, forþon þe he ær gehyrde be him, & forþon þe he geseah, hulic he wæs, þæt þæt wære sum ceorlisc bysmrung.
Forþon þe he wende, þæt swa sceort man & swa unfægger on ansyne ne mihte næfre habban swa ormætne haligdomes hlisan.
Ac þa þa him to soðan gesæd wæs fram manegum mannum, þæt hit se ylca wære, þa forseah he hine sona & hloh þus cweþende: ic wende, þæt þes sceolde beon mycel & fæger.
Nu næfð he naht men gelices.

Þa se Godes wer Constantius þæt gehyrde, he forlet þa swiðe bliðe þa leohtfatu, þe he rædde & fylde, & swiðe hraðe ofdune astah & gefeoll on þæs ceorles clyppinge & hine mid swyþlicre lufan ongan teon to him be þam earmum & cyssan & mycle þancas him sæde, þæt he swa be him gedemde & þus cwæð: þu ana hæfdest ontynde eagan on me & me mid rihte oncneowe.
Of þære wisan, Petrus, we magon ongytan, hwylcere eadmodnysse man he wæs mid him sylfum, se þe lufode þone ceorl þæs þe swiðor, þe he hine forseah.
Ac symble se ongebrohta teona acunnað, hulic gehwilc man byþ innan on his dygolnysse mid him sylfum.

Forþon þa oferhydigan blissiað for þam arum þe hi begytað, swa eac full oft þa eaðmodan blissiað for heora forsewennysse, & þonne hi geseoð hi sylfe yfellice on oðera manna eagum, hi þæs þonne gefeoð, forþon þe hi witon, þæt hi wile God geseon, þeah hi men forseon.
Petrus cwæð: þæs þe ic ongyte, þes wæs mycel wer utan on þam mægnum þe he worhte, & eac he wæs mara innan in his eaðmodnesse.
Gregorius him andswarde & cwæð: eac swylce þære ylcan cyrican Anchonitane biscop wæs swyðe arwurðes lifes wer, þam wæs nama Marcellinus.
Þæs feþe getugon mycle fotswylas & fornamon, swa þæt hine bæron his hiwan on heora handum swa hwider swa him þearf wæs.
Soðlice sume dæge hit gelamp þurh gemeleasnysse, þæt seo ylca cæster Anchonitana wearð on bryne.
& þa þa heo swyþlice barn, þa urnon þa gebroðru ealle, to þon þæt hi þæt fyr adwæsctan.
& heom þa geornlice þæt wæter onweorpendum to þon swiðe se lig weox, þæt heom þuhte, þæt eall seo burh forbyrnan sceolde.

& þa þa þæt fyr geondferde ealle þa neahstowa & þære burge unlytelne dæl fornam & forbærnde & him nænig man wiðstandan ne mihte, þa com se biscop, se wæs boræn on his hiwcuðra broðra handum, & he wæs gecnyssed & gebæded for neodþearfa swa myccles plyhtes.
Þa bebead he þam þe hine bæron þus cweþende: asettað nu me ongæn þysum fyre.
& þæt þa swa wæs gedon, þæt he wæs þær aseted, þær hit gesewen wæs, þæt þæs liges mægn & strengð mæst wæs.
Þa ongan seo bryne mid wundorlicum gemete beon gebiged in hi sylfe, efne swa swa mid bignysse his agnes onræses, swylce se lig cleopode & cwæde, þæt he for þam biscope furður faren ne mihte.

& swa hit wæs geworden, þæt se lig in þære bærninge æt þam gemære þæs biscopes wearð swa gehæft & gecyrred, þæt he in him sylfum acolode, & on ufan þæt he naht þære burge botles ne gehrinan ne dorste.
Gehygest þu, Petrus, hu myccles haligdomes þis wære, þæt se mettruma man sæt ongæn þam fyre & mid his gebedum þæs fyres mægen & strengðe todwæscte?
Petrus cwæð: ic hit gehicge & his eac wundrige.

Gregorius him andswarode: be þissere neahstowe ic þe eac hwæthugu sæcge, þæs þe ic ongæt fram Maximianes gesægene þæs arwurðan biscopes & fram Lauriones þæs ealdan muneces, þe þu gære canst, þara ægðer nu gyt leofaþ.
Se Laurio wæs afeded & gelæred fram þam halgan were Anastasie in þam mynstre, þe is gehaten Subpentama neah Nepesinam þære byrig.
& se Anastasius wæs geþeoded mid mycelre geornnysse to Nonnoso þæs arwurðan lifes, se wæs prafost on þam mynstre, þe geseted is in þam munte Soractis.
& he him þeodde to fore þære stowe neawiste & for his þeawa & mægna mycelnysse.
Se ylca Nonnosus drohtnode under þam reþestan fæder his mynstres, ac þæs þeawas he aræfnode symble mid wundorlicum geþylde.
& swa he wæs fore þam broðrum mid mycelre monþwærnysse, swa he eac swiðe gelomlice mid his eadmodnesse gestilde þæs lareowes reþnesse & hatheortnysse.

Þa forþon þe þæt mynster wæs geseted in heanum cnolle þæs muntes, swa þæt þær nahwær næs nænigu smeþnes, þæt man mihte aht to þan lytelne wyrtun þam broðrum to nytte gewyrcan, þa wæs þær an stow swyþe sceort in þæs muntes sidan, þa abysgode seo mycelnes þæs unmætan stanes, se wæs asceoten gecyndelice of þam munte.
Þa sume dæge þohte se arwyrþa wer Nonnosus, þæt seo ylce stow mihte beon gecoplice wyrta on to settanne, gif seo mycelnes þæs stanes nære.
Þa gearn him on mod, þæt ne mihte hundteontig oxena þone stan onstyrian.
& þa þa him wæs geworden seo orwennys be þam menniscan gewinne, he forgeaf hine sylfne to þære godcundan frofre & hine þa þær abysgode ealle þa niht in his gebede.
Þa sona swa hit morgen wæs, þa comon þa gebroðru to þære ylcan stowe & fundon þone stan swa mycelre mycelnesse of þære stowe feor gewitanne.
& þa for his feorrunga gewearð þam gebroðrum þær genoh rum stow wyrta on to settanne.
Eac hit gelamp on oðre tid, þæt se ylca arwyrða wer hof upp glæsene leohtfatu in þam gebedhuse.
Þa feoll an of his handum, þæt hit wearð tobrocen & tostrægd on unarimedlice styccu.

Þa ondred he him þa mycclan hatheortnysse þæs mynstres hlafordes & þa sona gesamnode ealle þa styccu þæs leohtfates & asette beforan þam weofode & hine sylfne astrehte on his gebede mid hefige geomrunge.
& mid þy þe he þæt heafod upp ahof of þam gebede, he funde gesund þæt leohtfæt, þe he ær ondrædende gesomnode in manegum sticcum.

Swa he þa wæs onhyrigende on þam twam wundrum twegra fædera mægnu: on þæs stanes mycelnesse Gregories dæde, þe þone munt onstyrede, & on geedniwunge þæs leohtfates Donates mægn, þe þone tobrocenan calic þære ærran gesynto eft ageaf.
Petrus cwæð: nu we habbaþ, þæs þe me þinceþ, be þam ealdan bysenum niwe wundru.
Gregorius him andswarode: wilt þu þe nylt, þæt þu hwæthugu in Nonnoses weorce oncnawe eac be Heliseus onhyrenesse?
Petrus cwæð: ic wylle & swyþe lustlice wille.
Gregorius þa gyt spræc: eac hit gelamp sume dæge, þæt in þam mynstre wæs wana ealdes eles.
& þa nealæhte seo tid, þæt man sceolde eleberigean somnian, ac þær ne ætywde ænig wæstm on þam eletreowum.

Þa geþuhte þæs mynstres hlaforde þæt ræd, þæt þa broþra foron on healfe gehwilce & somnedon ele & þæt earnodon mid heora handa weorcum to utancumenum mannum, þæt hi hwæthugu eles eft ham brohton to þam mynstre of þæra mede heora weorces.

& sona swa þæt gehyrde se drihtnes wer Nonnosus, he styrde hi þa mid mycelre eadmodnysse, þæt þæt swa beon ne mihte, þy læs hit gelumpe, þæt þa broðra utfarende of þam mynstre, þa hwile þe hi sohton þa gestreon þæs eles, þæt hi hwylcne æfwyrdlan geþrowedon heora agenra sawla.

Ac þa forþon þe he geseah, þæt on þam treowum wæron feawa eleberigan, þe to þam mynstre belumpon, þa heht he þa gesomnian & don on bydene, & swa hwæt swa man mihte gedon þæt þær uteode, þeah þe hit medmycel ele wære, þæt man þæt to him sylfum brohte.
& þæt wæs swa gedon, þæt þa broðra onfengcon hwylcnehugu ele in anum medmycclum fate & þone brohton Nonnose þam Godes þeowe.
& he þa sona þone asette beforan þam weofode, & utgangendum eallum þam oþrum broðrum he hine gebæd lange hwile.

& þa sona æfter þan eft gecigde þa broðru & heom bebead, þæt hi þone ele namon, þe hi ær to him brohton, & hine todældon geotende swiðe gneþelice geond ealla þa fatu þæs mynstres, to þon þæt þa fatu ealle wæron hwæthugu ingegotene mid bletsunge þæs ylcan eles, & het þa sona þa fætelsas bewreon & inne belucan, swa æmtigu swa hi þa wæron.
& þa oðre dæge, þe hi eft unwrigene wæron, hie wæron fulle gemette, & þæt wæs fore gewilnunge þæs halgan weres Nonnoses.
Petrus cwæð: ælce dæge we acunniað, þæt þære soþfæstnysse word beoþ gefyllede, þæt is Crist.
Seo soðfæstnyss is Godes sunu, se cwæð on his godspelle: nu gyt min fæder wyrceð, & ic eac wyrce.

Gregorius him andswarode: eac hit gelamp in þa ylcan tid, þæt se arwyrða wer Anastasius, þæs gemynd ic herbufan sæde, se wæs writere in þissere halgan Romane cyrican, þære ic þeowige Gode stihtigendum minum ordfruman.
Se Anastasius forlet þa scrine his feohgestreones & mynster geceas & gewilnode, þæt he geemtigode hine Gode anum to þeowiganne.
& þa on þære stowe, þe ic ær beforan spræc, seo is haten Subpentoma, he gelædde his lif manega gær þær on manegum dædum & þam mynstre fore wæs mid geornlicre heordnysse.
& ofer þa stowe ufon wæs hangiende unmæte stanclif, & eac beneoðan swiþe deop neowelnys geonode.

Þa sume nihte, þa þa se ælmihtiga God geteohhode, þæt he þa gewin geedleanode þæs arwyrðan weres Anastasies, fram þam hean clife wæs stefn geworden, seo forð gelæddum hleoðre swa gecleopode & þus cwæð: cum, Anastasius.
& þa him swa gecigdum þær wæron eac oþre VII broðru be naman gecigde.
Þa ane berhtmhwile aswygode seo stefn, þe þyder onsænded wæs, & þa eft gecigde þone eahtoþan broður.
Mid þy þa seo gesomnung eall gehyrde swa openlice þa stefne, þa næs þær nænig tweo, þæt hit nealæhte þara forðfore, þe þær gecigde wæron.
Þa ymb feawa dagas ærest se arwyrða wer Anastasius geferde, & þa eft þa oðre broþru wæron of lichaman gelædde be ændebyrdnysse, swa swa hi ær gecigde wæron of þæs stanclifes heannesse.

& þa se broðer, þe æt þære cigingce seo stefen hwæthugu geswigode & hine eft genæmde, swa þa sweltendum þam oþrum broðrum he leofode feawa dagas & þa his lif geendode, swa þæt openlice wæs gecyþed, þæt seo betweoh ongesette swigung ðære ufan cymenan stefne getacnode medmycelne fyrst to lybbanne þam broðer ofer ða oðre, þe þær eac gecigde wæron.

Eac þær gelamp wundorlic wise, þæt þa þa se arwyrða wer Anastasius utferde of his lichaman, þa wæs sum broður in þam ylcan mynstre, þe ofer hine libban nolde, ac he þa forð onloten to his fotum ongan hine biddan mid tearum þus cweþende: ic þe halsige þurh þone, þe þu to færst, þæt ic ne þurfe lybban VII dagas ofer þe in þisum middanearde.

Þa ær Anastasies þam seofoðan dæge, se ylca broðer wæs eac forðfered, se þonne hwæþre in ðære nihte betweoh þam oþrum broðrum næs na geciged, ac hit wæs openlice gecyþed, þæt his forðfore begeat seo þingung þæs arwyrðan Anastasies.

Petrus cwæð: þa þa þes ylca broþer næs betweoh þam oþrum geciged & hwæþre getogen wæs of þisum leohte mid geþingum þæs halgan weres, hwæt magon we ærest ongytan, nemne þæt þa þe mycelre geearnunge beoð mid drihtene, hwilum hi magon begytan þa þing, þe heom ær teohhode næron?

Gregorius him andswarode: ne magon hi nænigra þinga begytan þa þing, þe heom ær geteohhode næron, ac þa þing, þe þa halgan weras mid heora benum gefremmað, hi beoð ær swa forestihtode, þæt hi sceolon beon eft mid benum begytene.

Soðlice seo ylce forestihtung eac þæs ecan rices wæs geseted þus fram ælmihtigum Gode, þæt his gecorenan becumaþ mid gewinne to þissum rice, & þæt hi sculon biddende geearnian, þæt hi onfon, þæt se ælmihtiga God geteohhode heom to onfonne ær eallre worulde.
Petrus cwæð: ic wolde, þæt me gyt openlicor wære gecyþed, hweþer beon mihte, þæt seo forestihtung mihte beon mid gebedum gefultumod.
Gregorius him andswarode: þu, Petrus, þis þæt ic þe sæde, hrædlice hit mæg beon þe gecyðed, & þu þe sylf wast, þæt ure drihten cwæð to Abrahame: þe byþ gecigd sæd in Isaace.
& eac he to him cwæð: þe ic gesette fæder manigra þeoda.
& eft he þam ylcan gehet þus cweþende: ic bletsige þe, & ic gemænifealde þin sæd swa swa heofones steorran & swa swa þa sandcorn, þa þe beoð be sæs waroðum.

Of þære wisan hit is openlice cuð, þæt se ælmihtiga God ær forestihtode, þæt he Abrahames sæd wolde gemanifealdigan þurh Isaac & hwæþre swa swa hit awriten is: Isaac wæs to his drihtne biddende for his wife, for þon þe heo wæs unwæstmbære.
Þa gehyrde drihten his bene & sealde Robeccan his wife wæstm.

Forþon þus wæs forestihtod seo manigfealdnys Abrahames cynnes þurh Isaac, forhwan elles onfeng Isaac unwæstmbære wif, buton forðon þe hit cuþ is, þæt seo forestihtung scolde beon mid bedum gefylled, þa þa he begæt mid his gebedum, þæt he mihte suna habban, on þam ylcan ær God forestihtode, þæt Abrahames sæd sceolde beon gemanigfealdod?
Petrus cwæð: nis me naht æniges tweon nu to lafe be þissere foresprecenan wisan, forþon þæt rihtgescead me ontynde þa deogolnesse þurh þine gesægene.
Gregorius him andswarode: wilt þu, þæt ic þe secge hwæthugu be þam dælum Tuscie þære mægðe, þæt þu ongyte, hulice weras wæron on þam lande & hu swyðe neah þæs ælmihtigan Godes cyðnysse?
Petrus cwæð: ic wille & þe þæs mid eallum gemete bidde.
Gregorius him andswarode: sum wæs swyþe arwyrðes lifes wer, þam wæs nama Bonefacius.
Se hæfde biscopdom in þære cæstre, þe is haten Ferentis, & þone biscophad mid his þenunge & mid his þeawum rihtlice gefylde.
Þyses manega wundru Gaudentius se mæssepreost me sæde, se nu gyt leofað.
Se wæs afeded on his þenunge, & he mæg swa mycele gewislicor secgan gehwylc þing be him, swa mycle ma him gelamp, þæt he sceolde betwyh his þegnungum beon.

Þisses ylcan Bonefacies cyrican gelamp, þæt þær wæs sume gære swiðe hefigu wædl & þearfednes, seo gewunað symble, þæt heo byþ þære eadmodnesse hyrde on godum & acorenum modum, & þær næs naht elcor to ealles geares andlyfne, buton þæt an, þæt he hæfde ænne wingeard.
& se þa sume dæge wæs forslagan & forhergod mid onhreosendum hægle, swa þæt on þam wingearde on feawum wintreowum uneaðe to lafe wunodon swyþe lytle & swyþe feawa geclystru þara winbyrgena.

& þa þes forecwedena wer se arwurða Bonefacius se biscop eode in þone wingeard, þa sæde he þam ælmihtigan Gode mycele þancas, þæt he ongæt, þæt God hine in þære his wædle þa gyt wolde ma geswæncan & genyrwian.

Ac swa þeah þa seo tid nealæhte, þæt þa feawa clystru þara bergena, þe þær læfde wæron, mihton ripe beon, þa sette he weard, swa hit þeaw wæs, to þam wingearde & bebead, þæt hine man scolde healdan mid geornlicre wacunge.
Þa sume dæge het he Constantium þone mæssepreost, se wæs his swustersunu, þæt man ealle þa winfatu in þære biscopscire & ealle þa bydenu, swa swa hit ær gewuna wæs, gegearwode & mid pice geondgute.
& þa sona swa hit gehyrde se mæssepreost his nefa, he wæs swiðe wundrigende & þohte, þæt þæt wære sum ungewittignesse, þæt he bebead, þæt man scolde þa winfatu gearwian, se þe nænig win næfde.
Þehhwæþre ne dorste se mæssepreost þone biscop geacsian, forhwon he swilc bude, ac he þa hyrde his hæsum & gegearwode ealle þa fatu, swa hit þeaw wæs.

Ac þa se Godes wer eode in þone wingeard & gesomnode þa geclystru þara byrgena & gebrohte in þæra wintreddan & het ealle þanon utgan, buton he ana mid anum lytlum cnihte þær wunode & þa þone cniht asette on þa ylcan wintreddan & het hine wringan þa feawa geclystru þære byrgena.

& þa þa he of ðam ylcan geclystrum ut aþyde lytelne dæl wines, þa ongan þæt se Godes wer mid agnum handum nyman on an lytel fæt & todælan mid bletsunge geond ealle þa bydena & geond ealle þa fatu, þe þær gegearwode wæron, þeh þe of þam ylcan wine wæron uneaðe geseowene þa fatu geondgotene.
& þa þa he of þam wætan þæs wines hwæthugu sænde geond ealle þa fatu, þa cigde he him þone mæssepreost to & het sona, þæt þa þearfan þær beon sceoldon.
& þa ongann þæt win weaxan in þære wintreddan & þa swa gefylde ealle þa fatu þara þearfena, þe him to gebrohte wæron.
& þa þa he geseah, þæt þa þearfan genoh hæfdon, he het þone cniht stigan of þære wintreddan & beleac þæt winern & asette his agen insegl on þæt loc.
He forlet hit swa belocen & sona him gecyrde eft to cyrcan.

Þa þy þryddan dæge, þa þa he his gebedu gedon hæfde, he cigde þone forecwedenan mæssepreost Constantium & untynde þæt winern & gemette þa fatu swa genihtsumlice mid wine gefyllede, þa þe he geat ær swyðe lytelne dæl þæs þynnestan wætan, efne þæt swa þa weaxendan winu woldon feallan ofer þa fatu on þone flor, gif se biscop þa gyt lættra wære, þæt he inne eode.
& þa Bonefacius se arwyrða wer swiðe ondrysenlice bebead þam mæssepreoste, þæt swa lange swa he sylfa leofode on lichaman, þæt he næfre ænigum men ne sæde þis wundor.
& he him þæt ondredde, þæt he scolde innan þanon atyddrian, þanon he utan wære mannum mycel æteowed, gif he o wære gecnyssed mid mænniscre herenesse fram þam mægne þyssere wyrde.

Ac he fylgde on þon þære bysene ures lareowes, þæt is Crist, se to þon þæt he us getrymede to eadmodnysse wege, he bebead his þegnum be him sylfum þus cweþende, þæt þæt þe hi gesawon, hi nanum men ne sædon, ær þan þe mannes sunu fram deaðe arise.

Petrus cwæð: forþon þe nu genoh gecoplicu wise hi sylfe gegearwode & gecyðde, me lysteþ acsian, hwæt þæt la sy, þæt ure alysend, þa þa he ageaf leoht & gesihðe twam blindum mannum, he bebead, þæt hi hit nanum men ne sædon, & hi þa sona þonon gangende gemærsodon hine geond eall þæt land.
Ac hwæt cwyðst þu?

Hweþer se acenneda Godes sunu, se is efnece þam fæðer & þam halgan gaste, on þissere wisan wolde gefyllan, þæt he gefyllan ne mihte, þa þa þæt wundor, þe he forswigian wolde, þæt hit nanra þinga forholen beon ne mihte?

Gregorius him andswarode: ure alysend þurh his þone mænniscan lichaman eall þæt he dyde, he gegearwode & gecyðde us þæt in þære bysene his weorces, to þon þæt we sceoldon folgian his swaðe be þam gemete ura mægena, & þæt we sceoldon on unforspurnedum fotum þisses andweardan weorces gan on þone weg þæs ecan lifes.
Witodlice se hælend worhte þæt wundor, & he het hit helan, & swa þeh hit forholen beon ne mihte.
On þan we magon cuðlice ongytan, þæt his gecorenan fylgeað þære bysene his lara in þam mycclum weorcum þe hi wyrcað.
& heora wylla byþ, þæt hi syn forholene; ac þeh þæt hi nytte syn oðrum mannum, hi beoð full oft geypte swa hi nellað.
& þæt byð mycelre eadmodnesse, þæt hi wilniað, þæt heora weorc syn forholene, & eac mycelre eadmodnesse, þæt hi heora weorc forhelan ne magon.

Nis hit na þæt, Petrus, þæt drihten wolde aht swylces beon & ne mihte beon, ac he sealde þa bysene mid þy lareowdome his sylfes lare, hwæt his leomu sceolan wilnian þæt we wæron, oððe hwæt hi sceolan nyllan.
Petrus cwæð: me licað þæt þu sagast.
Gregorius him andswarode: nu gyt hwylcehugu wisan wæron to lafe, þa we willaþ sprecan be Bonefacies weorce þæs biscopes, þæs gemynd we dydon herbufan.
Hit gelamp on sume tid, þæt to genealæhte se gebyrddæg þæs eadigan Procules mynstres.
On þære stowe wunode swyþe æþel wer, þam wæs nama Furtunatus.
Se mid micclum benum bæd þone arwurðan wer Bonefacium, þa þa he gedyde his mæssan symbelnysse æt þam eadigan martyre, þæt he gebuge to his huse & him bletsunge sealde.
Þa ne mihte he forsacan þæt Godes mægn, forðon þe hine bæd þæs seo soðe lufu of Furtunates mode.

& þa gedonum symbelnessum þæra mæssan, þa þa he com to þæs forecwedenan Furtunates beode, þa ær ðon þe he Gode þone lofsang asægde, swa swa sume men gewuniaþ, þæt hi singað mid hergendlicum cræfte ær hi etan, þa stod þær semninga sum man mid anum apan & bæd him metes & sloh cymbalan.
Þa sona se halga wer wæs forhycgende þæt glig & eorringa þus cwæð: wala wa.
Dead sceall beon þes erming.
Ic com to þises gereordes mysan, & nu gyt ic na minne muþ to Godes herenysse ne ontynde, & he com mid apan & sloh cymbalan.
Þa get he togeecte þas word & cwæð þus: gangað Ge nu & for Godes lufan syllað him mete & drync, & witað ge hwæþre, þæt he dead byð unfyrn.
Þa se ungesæliga wer sona swa he þone hlaf & þæt win onfeng, þa wolde he gan þurh ðæs huses duru.
Ac þær feoll an unmæte stan of þam hrofe þæs huses & hine færinga ufan on þæt heafod sloh.
For þam slege he feoll adune, & hine man þa healfcwicne upp ahof, & þam oðran dæge æfter þæs Godes weres cwide eallinga he his lif geendode.
On þære wisan, Petrus, us is to gehycganne, hu mycelne ege we sceolon witan to ðam halgum werum, þa syndon Godes templu.
& þa þa se halga wer wæs getogen to hatheortnysse for ðam unnyttan glige, hwylc wæs þær aweht to þam eorre, butan þam ylcan temples ineardiend, þæt wæs Crist?
Forþon us is swa mycle ma to ondrædanne rihtwisra manna yrre, swa mycle ma us cuð is, þæt se byð andweard in heora heortum, se þe naht unstrang nis wræce to donne, þam þe he wile.
Eac hit gelamp on sumre tide, þæt se forecwedena mæssepreost Constantius þæs biscopes swustersunu bebohte his hors to twelf mancussum & þa þa mancessas alegde in his agene cyste.
& he gewat feran ut sum dæl oðres weorces to wyrcanne.
Þa semninga comon þa þearfan to þam biscope, þa hine bædon swiðe gemahlice, þæt heom se halga Bonefacies biscop hwæthugu sellan scolde to frofre heora wædle.
Ac se Godes man nyste hwæt he heom sealde.
Þa ongan he hatian on his geþance & smeagan, þæt þa þearfan ne eodon æmtige onweg fram him.
Þa semninga gehwearf him to gemynde, þæt se mæssepreost Constantius his mæg bebohte þæt hors, þæt he sylf ær full oft on sæt, & þæt ilce weorð hæfde þa gyt on his cyste gehealden.

Þa æfweardum þam ylcan his nefan se biscop eode to þære cyste, & arfullice nyd nimende he tosloh þa locu þære cyste & þær genam þa XII mancossas & þa gedælde þam þearfendum mannum, swa swa him wel licode.
& þa þa Constantius com ham of his weorce, þa funde he his cyste tobrocene, & he ne funde his horses weorð, þæt he þæron legde.
Þa ongan he mid mycelre stefne hlydan & mid swyðlicre hatheortnysse clypian & þus cwedan: ealle her libbaþ, & ic ana ne mæg libban on þysum hirede.
Þa buton tweon to þæs þam manigfealdum & ungefohlicum stefnum se biscop com, & ealle þa witan mid him, þe in þære biscopscire wæron.
& þa þa se Godes wer wolde hine gemetgian & gestillan mid liðre spræce, he ongan him symble andswarian mid gecide & cweþan: ealle man magon libban mid þe, buton ic ana ne mæg her beforan þe libban.
Ac agif me mine mancessas.

Þa wæs se biscop onstyred mid þam wordum, & þa eode he in þa cyrican þære eadigan & þære clænan fæmnan sancta Marian, & upp ahafenum handum & aþenedum his sceate he ongan standende biddan, þæt him God forgæfe, þæt he gestillan mihte þæs hatheortan preostes unstilnysse.

& þa þa he færinga beseah in his agenne sceat betwih his þa astrehtan earmas, þa gemette he in his agenum sceate XII mancessas, & þa wæron swa lixende, swa swa hi wæron on þa ylcan tid of fyre ut atogene.
& he þa sona wæs utgangende of þære cyrcan, & þa awearp he þa mancossas in þæs hatheortan mæssepreostes sceate þus cweþende: loca, nu þu hafast þine mancossas, þa þe þu sohtest.
Ac sy þe þis cuþ, þæt æfter minum deaðe þu ne bist þissere cyrcan biscop for þinre gitsunge.
Of þam cwide mihte beon mid soðe ongeten, þæt se mæssepreost þæt ilce feoh to þan begæt, þe he þohte, þæt he þone biscophad mid gebycgan wolde.
Ac þæs Godes weres word wæs to þan strang, þæt se ylca mæssepreost Constantius on preosthade his lif geendode.
Eac hit gelamp on sume tid, þæt him comon twegen men to of Gotena þeode, þa sædon, þæt hi to Rauennan faran woldon.
& þa sealde he heom mid his agenre handa ane trywene flascan wines fulle, to þon þæt hi mihton heom þa on heora færelde to underngeweorce habban.
Of þære hi druncon, oþ þæt hi to Rauennan becomon.

& wel manige dagas þa Gotan in þære ylcan cæstre gewunodon, & þæt win, þe hi fram þam halgan were onfengon, daga gehwylce hi heom þæt win to bryce hæfdon, & swa hit heom gelæste, oð þæt hi eft to þam ilcan & þam arwurðan fæder comon.
& hi nanum dæge ne geblunnon, þæt hi ne druncon of þam ylcan fate, & heom nanes wines wana næs.
& swa hit wæs to ongitanne, þæt swa swa hit on þam trywenum fate, þe se biscop sealde, þæt win nære na elles geeced, ac swylce hit þærin weaxende wære.
Eac swilce nu niwan us to com sum eald preost of þære ylcan stowe sumum dæle, forþon þe þa wisan, þe he be him sæde, næran us þa mid swigunge to forlætanne.
Soðlice he sæde, þæt se halga wer sume dæge eode in his wyrttun.
Þa gemette he þone wyrttun oferwrigene mid unasecgendlicre mænige emela.
& he þæt geseah, þæt þa wyrta ealle forweorðan sceoldon.
Þa gecyrde he hine to þam ilcum emelum & þus cwæð: ic eow halsige on naman ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes, þæt ge heonon gewitan, & ge læng þas wyrta ne etan.
Ða sona swa se Godes wer þa word gecweden hæfde, swa wæron hi sona ealle utgangende, þæt þær nan anlipig binnan þam fæce þæs wurtgeardes to lafe ne wunode.

Ac hwilc wundor is, cwæð sanctus Gregorius, þæt we þas wisan secgaþ be þære tide his biscophades, nu hit gesæd is, þæt he þa geo mid þam ælmihtigan Gode weoxe samod in endebyrdnysse, ge eac swylce in þeawum godra dæda, & þa weorc us syndon swyðor to wundrianne, þa þe us se ealda preost cyþðe, þæt he þa worhte, þa he þa get in his geogoðhade lytel wæs?
Soðlice he cwæð, þæt on þa tid þe he mid his meder on cnihthade eardode, he wæs ut gangende of hire huse, & full oft butan his kemese & eac gelomlice butan his tunecan he eft on hire huse cyrde.
Forðon sona gif he ænigne þearfan nacodne gemette, þonne wæs he hine sylfne ungyrdende, & mid his hrægle he þone þearfan gescrydde.
To þon he þis dyde, þæt he him sylfum geearnode mede beforan Godes eagum.
Þa gewunode his agen moder, þæt heo hine gelomlice mid wordum þreade þus cweðende, þæt hit riht nære, þæt he sylf, þe wædla wæs, oðrum þearfendum mannum his hrægl sealde.
Þa sume dæge eode his moder into hire byrene.
Þa gemette heo hire hwæte ealne beon neah gedæledne fram hire agenum suna þearfendum mannum, eall þæt heo ofer gær habban scolde to bygleofan.
Þa ongan heo þerscan heo sylfe mid hire fyste ge eac mid hire bradum handum & cwæð, þæt hire to lore gedon wære ealles þæs gæres bigleofa.
Þa com se Godes cniht Bonefacius & ongan his modur frefrian.
Ac þa þa heo naht þære frofre onfon nolde, he bæd hire, þæt heo ut of þam byrene gan sceolde, in ðam of eallum heora hwæte wæs funden hwæt lytles gelæfed.
Þa se Godes cniht astrehte hine sylfne on gebede, & þa þæs ymb lytel he eode ut & gelædde his moder eft in to ðam byrene.
& þa gemette heo hit eft swa full hwætes, swa hit ærror næs þæs gæres gefylled.
& heo þa sona þæs gefægnode, þæt heo hæfde ealles þæs gæres bigleofan.
Þa gesewenum þam wundre seo moder wæs onbryrded & swiðe gefeande ongan Gode þancas secgan, forþon þe he þam cnihte swylce gife forgæf, þæt he swa hrædlice mihte onfon swa hwæt swa he bæd.
Eac þeos ylce his modur gewunode, þæt heo hæfde henna & fedde in þam ingange hire huses.
Ac þa hire afyrrde & bereafode an fox, se com geneahhe naht feorran.
Þa sume dæge stod Bonefacius se cniht in þam ilcan ingange; þa com se fox, swa his þeaw wæs, & genam ane hæn.
& he þa sona swyþe hraðe gearn to cyrican & astrehte hine sylfne on gebede & mid openum stefnum he cwæð: licað þe nu, min drihten, þæt ic ne mæg etan of þam fostornoþe minre modur?
Geseoh nu, þæt se fox etað þa henne, þe heo fedde.
Þa aras he of his gebede & eode ut of þære cyrcan.
Þa sona gecyrde se fox & forlet þa henne, þe he in his muðe hæfde, & he þa sweltende gefeoll on eorðan beforan þæs cnihtes eagum.
Petrus cwæð: swiðe wundorlic is þæt, þæt God hine geæadmodað, þæt he gehyreð þara bene, þe on hine gehihtað, & eac on swa yfellicum wisum.
Gregorius him andswarode: þis wæs gedon, Petrus, of mycelre stihtunge ures scyppendes, þæt we gehihtan sceolon þa maran god þurh þa lytlan, þe we her onfoð.
Soðlice hit wæs gehyred in þam yfellicum þingum, þæt þes cniht wæs halig & bylwytte, to þan þæt he on lytlum þingum geleornode, hu swiðe he sceolde aþristigean on mycclum benum.
Petrus cwæð: wel me licað þæt þu cwiðst.
Gregorius him andswarode: sum swiþe arwyrðes lifes wer wæs on þam ylcan dælum, þam wæs nama Furtunatus, se wæs biscop þære ylcan cyrcan Tudertine.

Se wæs þeonde & weaxende on unmætre gife gastlicra mægna to þon swiðe, þæt he þa unclænan gastas of mannum aflyman mihte, swa þæt he ful oft þara deofla weoredu adraf of þam mannum, þe hi ær geswencton.
& he wæs geornfull mid teolone his singalra gebeda þem angæn gesettum deofla mænigum, þe wið him teolonge wunnon, þæt he hi oferswyðde.
Eac sum wer wæs þissere ylcan cyrican mundbora, þæs nama wæs Iulianus.
He wæs us se hiwcuðesta, & he wæs nu unfyrn on þissere ylcan byrig forðfered.
For þæs gesægenum, cwæð sanctus Gregorius, ic geleornode, þæt ic nu secgan wille, forþon he oft betweoh wæs Furtunates dædum mid bylde þære hiwcuðnysse.
& æfter þon his gemynd he geheold us to trymnysse, forþon hit him wæs swa wynsum, swa he hæfde beobreades swetnysse on his muþe.
He sæde, þæt þær wære sum æþele gesiðwif in þam neahdælum Tuscie mægðe.
Seo hæfde ane snore, þa hire sunu lytle ær him to wife onfeng.
Seo wæs gelaðod mid þære ylcan hire swegre to cirichalgunge þæs eadigan martyres Sebastianes gebedhuses.

Þa gelamp þære ylcan niht, þe heo scolde on morgen to þære cyrichalgunge faran þæs foresprecenan gebedhuses, þa wearð heo mid hire lichaman luste oferswiðed, swa þæt heo ne mihte hi sylfe forhabban fram hire were.
& þa gewordenum þam ærmergene heo wearð on hire ingeþohte afyrhted, forþon þe heo þa þurhtogenan lustas on hire lichaman gefremede.
Hire forbead þa þone forðgang seo sceomu to þære cyrichalgung, forþon þe heo wæs ma scamigende for manna onsyne, þonne heo wære þone Godes dom ondrædende.
Þa ferde heo forð mid hire swegre to þære halgunge þæs gebedhuses.

Þa sona swa hi wæron gangende in þæt gebedhus, þær þa reliquias wæron þæs eadigan martyres Sebastianes, þa gegrap se awyrgda gast heo þa ylcan snore þæs foresædan gesiþwifes, & beforan eallum þam folce he ongan heo swiðe swencan.
& þa se mæssepreost þære ylcan cyrcan geseah, þæt heo swiðe geswenced wæs, he genam sona þa scetan of þam weofode & oferwreah hi mid.
& þa sona eode se deofol in þone ylcan mæssepreost, & forþon þe he wolde ofer his agen mægn aht swylces geneþan, he wæs genyded, þæt he mihte on his agenre geswæncednysse ongytan, hwæt he sylf wæs.
Þa þa men, þe þær æt wæron, namon þæt wif on þam gebedhuse mid heora handum & hi bæron to hire agnum huse.

& þa þa se ealda feond mid langre geswæncednysse bregde þis ylce wif swyðe & þa hire magas, þe hi lichamlice lufedon & for þære lufan hire mid wæron, befæston hi þam drym & þam scincræftigum, to þon þæt hi begæten hire þær hælo & læcedom þær funden, & hi na ne scrifan, þeh hi eallinga hire sawle adwæsctan.
Þa ongunnon hi helpan hire lichaman mid heora drycræftum to sumre hwile.
Heo wæs gelæded to anre ea & bedypped in þæt wæter, & hi þær þa dryas ongunnon ferian geond þæt wæter & mid langum onsangum hi golon on, oð þæt se deofol of hire uteode, þe hi ær in gefor.

Ac þa for þam wunderlican dome þæs ælmihtigan Godes, þa se an deofol hire wæs of adrifen mid heora þam forcyrdan cræfte, sona on hi geeode mycel mæniu deofla, & heo þa ongan on þa ylcan tid swa manegum styrenyssum beon onstyred & swa manegum stefnum & cleopungum hlydan, efne swa heo fram manegum awyrgdum gastum wæs gehæfd & geþread.
Þa eodon hire magas in geþeaht & geandetton, þæt hit heora agnes ungeleafan scyld wære, þæt hi þone læcedom to þam scincræftigum sohton.
Ac hi þa gelæddon þæt wif to þam arwyrðan were Furtunato þam biscope & hi to þam forleton.

& he þa hi onfeng & hine þa sylfne abysgode on his gebede manega dagas & nihta, & swa mycele ma he gefealh mid geornnysse þam gebedum, swa myccle ma he ongæt him ongæn standan in anum lichaman þæt weorod þara deofla mænigeo.
& þa ymb manega dagas he agæf heo hire freondum hal & gesund, swilce hire se deoful næfre ænigne anweald ne ahte.
Eac hit gelamp on oðre tid, þæt se ilca wer Furtunatus þæs ælmihtigan Godes þeowa adraf þone unclænan gast of sumum geswenctum & ofsettum men.

& se awyrgda þa þa se dæg æfnode geseah, þæt seo tid wæs mannum dyglu, geonlicte hine sylfne to sumum ælþeodigum men & ongann gan ymb þa cæstre & geond þa stræta & þus cwæð: gehyrað nu, hwæt se halga werr dyde Furtunatus se biscop.
Nu he adraf me ælþeodigne man of his huse, & ic forþon sece, hwær ic me gerestan scyle, nu ic on his cæstre nane ne fand.
Þa sum man sæt æt þam gledum in his huse mid his wife & mid his lytlan suna.
Se gehyrde his stefne & acsode, hwæt se biscop him dyde, & hine laðode, þæt he sæte mid him in his huse æt þam gledan.
& he þa swa dyde.
Þa spræcon hi heom betwux wel fela worda, oð æt nexstan se ylca awyrgda gast gefor in þone lytlan sunu þæs earman mannes & hine awearp in ða glyda, & þær sona his feorh him ætþrang.
& he þa sona se earma man swa astyped & swa bereafod his suna ongæt hraðe, hwæne he sylfa feormode, ge eac hwane se biscop ær ut adraf.
Petrus cwæð: hwæt cweðað we la, hwæt þæt sy, þæt se ealda feond onfeng swylcere bylde to acwyllane in þæs huse, þe hine gelaþode to him mid cumliþnysse gyfe & wende, þæt he ælþeodig wære?
Gregorius him andswarode: fela þinga, Petrus, beoð gode gesewene, ac hi ne beoð na gode, forþon hi ne beoð of godum mode cumene.
Be þan seo soðfæstnys cwæþ on his godspelle: gif þin eaga byð manfull, þonne byð þin lichama eall þystrig.
Forþon þonne þæt ingeþanc þæs mannes byð woh & forcyrred, þe þær foregangeþ, þonne bið þæt weorc eall þweorh & unriht, þe þær æfterfylgeþ.
Forþon ne wene ic na, þæt þes wer wære mid arfæstnysse mode gelustfullod, ac mid tælnysse þæs biscopes.
Se þe his suna bereafod wæs, se ongan swilce he for Godes lufan gestliþnysse gegearwode.
Soðlice þæt æfterfylgende wite þær cyþðe, þæt seo ærre feormung næs na butan scylde & gylte.
Eac swylce manige men syndon, þe forþon tiliað, þæt hi god don, þe hi willað gedwellan þa gife oðera manna weorces.
Ne hi na forþon oþre mæn feormiað, þæt hi mycclum gyman, hwæþer heom þæt god sy þæt hi doð, ac ma hi wyllað, þæt hi syn beforan oðrum mannum wel geherede.

For þere wisan ic wene, cwæð sanctus Gregorius, þæt we magon ma behealdan þysne wer, þe þone awyrgdan gast on gestliþnysse onfeng in æteownysse þæs idlan gylpes þurh þa deofollican costunge, þonne we magon geþencan, þæt he betran dæde dyde þonne se Godes wer.
Ac he wolde, þæt for mannum gesewen wære, þæt he betran lifes wære þonne se biscop, þa he þone man onfeng, þe se drihtnes wer Furtunatus ær onweg adraf.
Petrus cwæð: eall hit is swa hit gesægd is.
Soþlice þæs weorces ænde gecyþde, þæt þæt ingeþanc næs clæne.
Gregorius him andswarode: eac hit sægð, þæt sum man wære, þe forlet his agene gesyhðe.
Þa wæs he gelæded to þam Godes were, to þan þæt he gewilnode & abæde him þa helpe þæs halgan mannes þingunga.

Soðlice þa þa se Godes wer hæfde gedon & gefylled his gebedu, he asette & awrat Cristes rodetacen ofer þæs mannes eagan þæs bysenan, & þa sona agyfenum þam leohte seo niht þære blindnysse gewat fram þam eagum.

& ufan þæt eac gelamp, þæt sumes militisces mannes hors wæs gecyrred in myccle reðnysse, swa þæt hit mihte uneaþe beon fram ænigum mannum gehealden, ac swa swilce swa hit mihte, hit slat & wundode heora limu mid bitum.
Þa wearð hit þeh gebunden fram manegum mannum & wæs gelæded to þam Godes were.
He þa sona awrat Cristes rodetacen on þam hæafde þæs horses mid his aþenedra handa & gecyrde ealle his reðnysse in manþwærnysse, swa þæt hit wæs stille, þonne hit wæs ær þære wedenheortnysse.
Þa se ylca þegn þæt his hors, þe he geseah acyrred fram his wedenheortnesse mid swa hrædlicum bebode þæs halgan wundres, he þa bebead, þæt man þam halgan were þæt ilce hors eft bringan sceolde.
Þa wiðsoc he, þæt he hit nateshwon underfon nolde.
Ac he on his wilnunge þurhwunode & bæd, þæt he his gife ne forsawe.
Þa se halga wer nam þæt hors & healfne þone weg on geferde.
& he þæs militiscan mannes bene gehyrde & hwæþre wiðsoc, þæt he hit to gife habban nolde swa for gebedenum mægene.
Ærest he gegearwode him medeme weorð for þan horse & þa æfter þan nam þæt hors, þe him wæs ær to gife geboden, forþon þe he geseah, gif he hit ne underfengce, þæt se wære geunrotsod, þe hit ær ahte.
Þa nydendre þære lufe he gebohte, þæt him nan þearf næs to habbenne.
Ne sceal ic eac na þis forswigian, þæt ic ongæt nu for anum XII nihtum huhugu swa.
Þa me wæs gelæded to sum eald þearfa, & ic þa acsode hine swiðe geornlice, hwæt he wære, swa swa symble me on gewunan wæs, þæt me wæs swyþe leof ealdra manna spræc.
& þa andswarode he me & sæde, þæt he wære of Tudertine þære cæstre.
Þa cwæð ic to þam: la, fæder, ic þe frine, hweþer þu cuþest Furtunatum þone biscop.
Se þearfa cwæð: ic hine cuþe.
Þa gyt ic cwæð: saga me, ic bidde þe, hwæðer þu ongæte his wundra ænigu & me wilniendum gecyð, hwilc se wer wære.
Þa cwæð se þearfa to me: se man wæs swiþe feorr & ungelic þysum mannum, þe we nu geseoð.
Soðlice eall swa hwæt swa he gewilnode æt Gode þam ælmihtigan, efne swa he his bæd, swa he wæs tyðe.

Þæs ylcan ic wylle secgan þæt an wundor, þe me nu on mode bearn, þæt sume dæge Gotan comon neah Tudertinum þære cæstre, þa onetton to Rauennan þære byrig, & hi genamon þær of þæs biscopes æhte twegen lytle cnihtas.
Seo æht þæra cnihta wæs underþeodod þære cæstre Tudertinam.
Mid þy þe þis wæs gebodod þam halgan wære Furtunato, he sænde men sona æfter & het to him gecigan þa ylcan Gotan.
Þa se Godes man wæs sprecende to þam Gotum mid liðum worðum & tihhode, þæt he sceolde ærest geliðian heora reðnysse.
& þa æfter þon he spræc þus & cwæð: hwylc weorð willað ge þæt ic sylle eow, & ge me agyfan þa cnihtas, þe ge on minum lande namon, & gegearwiað me þæt to gife eowres þances?
Þa se þe þær yldost wæs him andswarode & þus cwæð: swa hwæt swa þu elles bebeodest, we syndon gearwe þæt to done.
Witodlice þas cnihtas we nateshwon ne gifað.
Þa se arwyrða wer wæs beotigende swiðe liðelice to þam & þus cwæð: þu me unrotsast nu þu nylt hyran þinum fæder.
Ac nylle þu me ma unrotsian, þy læs hit þe eft ofþynce.
Ac þa gyt se ylca Gota þurhwunode on his heortan reðnysse & swa wiðsacende onweg gewat.
Þa þam oðrum dæge eode he eft, oð he com to þam biscope.
& þa bæd se biscop hine eft þæs mid þam ylcum wordum þara forecwedena cnihta.
& þa þa he nolde nænigra þinga geþafa beon, þæt he hi agyfan wolde, þa wæs se biscop swiðe geunrotsod & þus cwæð: ic wat, þæt þe na ne helpeð, þæt þu ga fram me þus unrotum.
Se Gota forseah þa word ealle & eft gecyrde to his huse & þa ylcan cnihtas asette on his hors.
Be þam wæs þus gedon: he sænde hi beforan him mid his mannum & him sylf sona strad upon his hors & wæs him æfterfarende.

& þa þa he com in ðære ylcan cæstre beforan þære cyrcan þæs eadigan apostoles sancte Petres, þa wearð his horse asliden se fot, & he þa mid horse mid ealle gefeoll, & sona his scanca wæs tobrocen, þæt þæt ban wæs todæled on twa stycca.
Þa wæs he upp aræred & on manna handum gelæded to þam cumenahuse.
He þa sona sænde þa cnihtas ham, þe he ær beforan sænde, & bead hi þam arwyrðan were Furtunato þus cweþende: fæder, ic þe bidde, þæt þu sænde to me þinne deacon.

Sona swa his deacon com to him liggendum, he gelædde þa cnihtas toforan him, þe he eallinga ær forsoc, þæt he hi æfre agyfan wolde, & he hi þa agæf þam diacone & þus cwæð: ga & sæge minum hlaforde þam biscope, þæt ic eom nu geslægen, forþon he me wyrgde.
Ac ic nu bidde hine, þæt he geþingie for me & nime þa cnihtas, þe he ær bæd.
Þa se deacon onfeng þa cnihtas & hi gelædde to þam biscope.
Þa sona se arwyrða wer Furtunatus gebletsode wæter & cwæð to his diacone: stregd þis gehalgode wæter ofer þæs licgendan mannes lichaman.
Soðlice þa ferde se diacon to þam Gotan, & he in to him eode & þæt gebletsode wæter stregde ofer his limu.
Þa gelamp þær swyþe wundorlicu wise, seo wæs swiðe to wafienne.

Þæt is, þonne sona swa þæt gehalgode wæter geran þæs Gotan scancan, þa wearð se bryce eall eft gestaðelod & þam sceancan wæs seo æfre hælo agifen, swa þæt he on þa ylcan tid aras of his ræste & eode to his horse & ferde eft on þone ylcan weg, þe he ær ongan, efne swilce he næfre ne geþrowode ænige deringe his lichaman.

& þa wæs þis geworden, þæt se se þe nolde beon underþeoded mid hyrsumnysse, to þon þæt he agæfe þam halgan were Furtunato his cnihtas for heora weorðe, se wæs eft genyded, þæt he ageaf hi butan ceape.
Þa þis þus gefylled wæs, se ealda man þa gyt tihhode, þæt he sæde me oðre wisan be þam ylcan halgan mæn.

Ac forþon þe me þa wæron æt manige men for þære lare, ic wæs abysgod, & eac me afeoll seo æfentid þæs dæges, þæt me næs alyfed, þæt ic swa lange moste gehyran þa weorc & þa dæde Furtunates þæs arwyrðan weres, þe ic wille & me lysteð symble gehyran, gif me alyfed byð for oðrum þingum.
Ac þa hwæþre oðrum dæge se ilca ealda man me rehte ma be him þa gyt swyðe wundorlice wisan.
He sæde me, þæt in ðære ylcan byrig Tudertina wære sum swyþe godes weorces wer, þam wæs nama Marcellinus.
Se eardode þær mid his swystrum twam.
Þam gelamp, þæt he for ðæs lichaman hefignysse & mettrumnesse wæs forðfæred on sæternes dæg þam halgan & þy easterlican æfenne.
Þæs lichama wæs feorr to berenne, þæt he ne mihte þy ylcan dæge beon bebyrged.
Þa wæs þær hwylchugu ylding þære tide, þe man sceolde þa licþegnunge & þa gedafenu þære byrgene gefyllan & gyldan.
Þa wæron his swustra mid his deaðe swiðe geswencte.
Hi urnon weopende to þam halgan Furtunate & ongunnon clypian mid micclum stefnum & þus cwædon: we witon, þæt þu hafast þara apostola lif & anweald.
Þu geclænsast hreofe & onlihtest blinde.
Cum eac & awæce uncerne broþur.

Þa sona swa he ongæt hira broður forðfæredne, he ongan þa sylf weopan for his deaðe & cwæð to þam wifum: gewitað inc anweg gan & ne secge git þis nanum mæn, forþon þæt is þæt gyt biddað þæs ælmihtigan Godes hæs, þam ne mæg naht wiðstandan.
Þa gewiton hi heom onweg gan, & þa se biscop him þær gewunode swiðe unrot for þæs forðfarenan mannes deaðe.

Þa þy æfterfylgendan sunnandæge ær þæs uppcumendan leohtes dagunge he gecigde his daiconas twegen him to & eode him to þæs forðfarenan mannes huse to þære stowe, þær se orsawla lichama læg, & hine sylfne þær abysgode on his gebede.
& þa gefyldum his gebede, he aras & gesæt neh þam lichaman þæs unlifigendan mannes.
& þa þone forþfarenan be naman gecigde mid unhludre stefne þus cweþende: waca, broðor Marcelle.

He dyde gelice þon swylce he swyðe leohtlice slepe & wæs aweht to þære nealecan stefne, þeh þe heo medmicclu wære, & sona untynde his eagan & locigende to þam biscope he þus cwæð: eala, hwæt dydest þu?
Eala, hwæt dydest þu?
Þa þam se biscop andswarode þus cweðende: hwæt dyde ic?
Þa cwæð he to þam biscope: gyrstandæge comon hi twegen to me, þa me adydon of þam lichaman, & hi me to godre stowe gelæddon.
Nu todæge wæs an onsended to me se cwæð: gelædað hine eft to þam lichaman, forþon þe Furtunatus se biscop com on his hus & hine to him gecigde.
& þa gefyldum þam wordum sona he wearð gelæded of þære untrumnysse & syþþan lange on þisum life wunode.
